DOC.brief_summary: The aim study describe mechanism ultra-acute hyperglycemic response return spontaneous circulation ( ROSC ) patient suffer out-of-hospital cardiac arrest . The investigator hypothesize ischemia reperfusion injury lead decrease secretion insulin glucose-like peptide 1 ( GLP-1 ) . Two blood sample draw : ( 1 . ) Immediately ROSC ( 2 . ) 60 minute first sample . Concentrations glucose , insulin , glucagon GLP-1 compare sample . Metabolic profile compare : ( 1 . ) diabetic non-diabetic patient ( 2 . ) survivor non-survivors .
DOC.brief_title: Mechanisms Ultra-acute Hyperglycemia After Successful Resuscitation From Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest
